FIRST.NAME.NO.WHITESPACE: First name: Must not contain whitespace
FIRST.NAME.NOT.EMPTY: First name: Must not be empty

LAST.NAME.NO.WHITESPACE: Last name: Must not contain whitespace
LAST.NAME.NOT.EMPTY: Last name: Must not be empty

PASSWORD.CONTAIN.ONE.DIGITAL.CHARACTER: Password: Must contain at least one digital character
PASSWORD.CONTAIN.ONE.LETTER: Password: Must contain at least one letter
PASSWORD.LENGTH: Password: Length must be between 6 and 16

USERNAME.LENGTH: Username: Length must be between 4 and 16
